SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.repositories

Class UserRepository

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.repositories.AbstractRepository<UserEntity>
pt.uc.dei.repositories.UserRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class UserRepository extends AbstractRepository<UserEntity>
Repository class for managing UserEntity persistence operations.

Provides data access methods specific to user entities, extending the basic CRUD operations from AbstractRepository. This class handles all database interactions related to user management.

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • findUserByEmail

      public UserEntity findUserByEmail(String email)
      Retrieves a user entity by email address.

      This method executes a named query "User.findUserByEmail" to locate a user with the specified email address. If no user is found, the method logs a warning and returns null.

      Parameters:
      email - The email address to search for (case-sensitive)
      Returns:
      The UserEntity matching the email address, or null if no user is found
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs during the database operation
      jakarta.persistence.NonUniqueResultException - If multiple users are found with the same email (should not occur if email is unique)
      See Also:
      • UserEntity

    • findUserById

      public UserEntity findUserById(Long id)
      Retrieves a user entity by its unique identifier.

      This method executes a named query "User.findUserById" to locate a user with the specified ID. If no user is found, the method logs a warning and returns null.

      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier to search for
      Returns:
      The UserEntity matching the ID, or null if no user is found
      Throws:
      jakarta.persistence.PersistenceException - If an error occurs during the database operation
      jakarta.persistence.NonUniqueResultException - If multiple users are found with the same ID (should not occur as ID is unique)
      See Also:
      • UserEntity

    • getUsers

      public List<UserEntity> getUsers(Long id, String email, String name, String phone, AccountState accountState, String roleStr, Office office, Boolean userIsManager, Boolean userIsAdmin, Boolean userHasManager, Parameter parameter, OrderBy orderBy, Integer offset, Integer limit)
      Retrieves a paginated and filtered list of users based on provided criteria.

      Supports dynamic filtering by ID, email, name, phone, account state, role, and office. Allows sorting by any parameter and supports pagination.

      Parameters:
      id - User ID to filter (optional)
      email - Email to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      name - Name or surname to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      phone - Phone number to filter (optional)
      accountState - Account state to filter (optional)
      roleStr - Role to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      office - Office to filter (optional)
      parameter - Sorting parameter (optional)
      orderBy - Sorting order (ASCENDING or DESCENDING)
      offset - Pagination offset (start position)
      limit - Pagination limit (max results)
      Returns:
      List of users matching the criteria

    • getTotalUserCount

      public long getTotalUserCount(Long id, String email, String name, String phone, AccountState accountState, String roleStr, Office office, Boolean userIsManager, Boolean userIsAdmin, Boolean userHasManager)
      Counts the total number of users matching the provided filters.

      Supports dynamic filtering by ID, email, name, phone, account state, role, and office.

      Parameters:
      id - User ID to filter (optional)
      email - Email to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      name - Name or surname to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      phone - Phone number to filter (optional)
      accountState - Account state to filter (optional)
      roleStr - Role to filter (optional, supports quoted and normalized search)
      office - Office to filter (optional)
      Returns:
      Total count of users matching the criteria

    • findActiveUsersForCycle

      public List<UserEntity> findActiveUsersForCycle()
      Finds all active users (not deleted) for cycle initialization.
      Returns:
      List of active user entities

    • findActiveUsersWithoutManager

      public List<UserEntity> findActiveUsersWithoutManager()
      Finds active users without a manager assigned. Used for validation before cycle creation.
      Returns:
      List of users without manager

    • findManagersAndAdmins

      public List<UserEntity> findManagersAndAdmins()
      Finds all users who are managers or administrators with complete accounts.

      List of UserEntity objects representing managers and administrators
